channel.title: CVE Feed for CRM Perks -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CRM Perks -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-31212|2024-08-02T14:53:31.090Z -- crm%20perks -- database%20for%20contact%20form%207%2C%20wpforms%2C%20elementor%20forms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in CRM Perks Database for Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor forms contact-form-entries allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Database for Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor forms: from n/a through 1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-31095|2024-08-02T14:45:25.672Z -- crm%20perks -- integration%20for%20hubspot%20and%20contact%20form%207%2C%20wpforms%2C%20elementor%2C%20ninja%20forms
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in CRM Perks Integration for HubSpot and Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Ninja Forms.This issue affects Integration for HubSpot and Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Ninja Forms: from n/a through 1.2.8.

item.title: CVE-2023-25976|2024-08-02T11:39:06.491Z -- crm%20perks -- integration%20for%20contact%20form%207%20and%20zoho%20crm%2C%20bigin
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in CRM Perks Integration for Contact Form 7 and Zoho CRM, Bigin plugin <=Â 1.2.2 versions.
